list.title: Your Interests – Ours #1 Priority
list.text: We care about our clients and see our main purpose in finding “the right legal provisions” to safeguard your specific business interests

list.title: We Resolve the Problems, Not Create Them
list.text: We say how you 'can do' and find out all the possible solutions to make all your ideas 'go live', instead of saying how you 'can’t do'.

list.title: Clear and Comprehensive Action Plan
list.text: Our legal aid and advices are clear, structured and easy to understand, include a number of actions or steps needed to achieve the goals. While You develop Your business, we safeguard it and take good care in implementing your most daring ideas.

list.title: ONLINE Accessibility
list.text: High-quality legal services are available online, accessible anytime, anywhere, and from any device.

list.title: Confidentiality
list.text: Attorney-client privilege and professional secrecy protect the confidentiality of all the information you share with us.

list.title: Cost Predictability
list.text: We pre-assess the scope of the task in advance and inform you of the services’ cost and timeframe. Transparency and predictability are the key to our Clients' trust.

list.title: Quality
list.text: All our advocates have more than 10 years of experience, and obtained numerous internationally recognized privacy certificates. We always ptovide all the services personally, and never involve students or interns

list.title: Openness to innovation
list.text: From you – goals to achieve, from us – innovative ideas and ways how to make them reality with no or minimal risks.

list.title: Individual approach
list.text: The cases may be similar, but never identical. We believe our advice goes beyond legal knowledge. Understanding our Client’s business is essential for delivering optimal legal solutions.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.second_title: Your Reliable Online Legal Services Partner.
aboutPage.third_title: Created to find solutions to your problems, not obstacles to your plans.

list.title: Proud of our client base and successful market presence since 2018
list.text:
Our Law Association was founded in 2018 in Lviv – a Ukrainian IT hub where 9 of the top 100 global outsourcing companies are located.
The implementation of the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) in May 2018, which established new 'rules of the game' in global markets, high fines, and an effective mechanism for accountability, influenced our specialization in the field of personal data.

list.title: Transition to online service delivery
list.text:
In 2020, due to the pandemic, our services, contract signing, and payment went online.
This expanded our client audience beyond our physical location, reduced unnecessary office maintenance costs to make our service prices accessible to everyone.

list.title: Internationally recognized qualification of our team
list.text:
Today, our team includes highly qualified lawyers with over 10 years of experience, a Master of Laws (LLM) degree from a prestigious European university, and internationally recognized certificates in personal data protection from the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP):
- CIPP/E (Certified Information Privacy Professional/Europe), certified professional in European personal data protection legislation.
- CIPP/US (Certified Information Privacy Professional/United States), certified professional in US personal data protection legislation.
- CIPM (Certified Information Privacy Manager), certified data protection manager.
- CIPT (Certified Information Privacy Technologist), certified technical engineer for data protection.

list.title: Our Mission
list.text: Founded to solve your problems, not create new ones. Our goal is to find 'how it can be done' and propose all possible ways to implement your boldest plans, rather than saying 'how it cannot be done'. We will bring your business, internet platform, app, and website into compliance with international requirements so that EU, UK, and US markets are open to your services and goods without the risk of fines or reputation loss.

services.title: OUR SERVICES
services.second_title: Your reliable partner for legal services online.
services.third_title: Created to find solutions to your problems, not obstacles to achieving your plans.

personal-data-protection.title: Personal Data Protection
personal-data-protection.topText:
Want to offer your products or services in the EU, UK, or US market? Then you are in the right place.
We will help align your website, application, and business with international requirements without the risk of fines or reputation loss.
personal-data-protection.content:
Personal Data Protection. Ensuring compliance of your website, application, and company activities with GDPR (EU), UK, and US requirements

 

  • Website compliance (Privacy Policy, Terms of Use, Cookie Policy)
  • Development of internal company documents, contracts, procedures
  • Personal data audit (categories, contractors, types of processing, subprocessors)
  • Consent of personal data subjects
  • Privacy risk assessment for new products and services (DPIA, LIA, PIA)
  • Cross-border data transfer risk assessment (TIA)
  • Marketing of products and services in compliance with international privacy requirements
  • Information security
  • Assistance with compliance with ISO 27001, ISO 27701 for data protection
  • Implementation of technical and organizational data protection measures
  • Legalization of personal data processing (proportionality and necessity of legitimate interest, contract performance, validity of consent from data subjects, other grounds)
  • Data breach response: actions to take and parties to notify, data protection
  • Response to requests from individuals and regulatory authorities
  • Outsourcing services of a certified Data Protection Officer (DPO)
  • Consultations
  • Online training for employees involved in personal data processing

real-estate-investments.title: Lawyer Services - Real Estate. Investments
real-estate-investments.content:
Protect your savings. Don’t fall victim to fraud or become the owner of a “property” that will never be commissioned.

Be informed about all risks and “hidden pitfalls” of future housing, whether concealed or “not disclosed” by the developer.

Without legal analysis of the property and consultation with a qualified lawyer, you might not only face unexpected expenses but also lose all your savings and miss out on your dream home.

Do not believe that purchasing real estate on the secondary market or through a realtor means you are “protected” and won’t fall victim to fraud. Paying for realtor services DOES NOT PROTECT you from fraudulent schemes.

Fraudulent schemes constantly evolve and are designed for such “protected” buyers who want to “save” on lawyer services, trust but don’t verify document authenticity, or overlook “minor” inaccuracies in documents due to a “bargain” price. They often fail to check for legal disputes or challenges to the seller’s ownership rights by third parties.

Many buyers give thousands of dollars in down payments for apartments and sign agreements without legally effective grounds for refunding such payments later.

Purchase property without hidden “surprises.” Don’t become one of several “owners” of a single property or fall for forged documents. Sleep peacefully instead of spending years in court with no chance of recovering your funds.

LEGAL ANALYSIS OF REAL ESTATE SALE-PURCHASE DOCUMENTS IN NEW BUILDINGS AND ON THE SECONDARY MARKET

Consultations on tax payments related to real estate transactions.

Gift and rental agreements for real estate.

Preparation of purchase, rental, or gift agreement texts on terms most favorable to the Client.

Developer, seller, and transaction legality analysis:

  • Responsibilities and compliance with legislative provisions.
  • Developer verification (licenses/permits, charter capital, founders, establishment date, leadership, tax debts, enforcement proceedings, bankruptcy, or dissolution).
  • Verification of legal disputes and debts of the seller, developer, general contractor, or construction customer.
  • Land plot documentation check: targeted purpose, lease agreement validity, legality, and existing legal disputes.
  • Parties involved and legality of existing agreements or contracts related to the real estate.
  • Registry data checks: State Register of Property Rights, Property Ownership Registry, Mortgage Registry, Unified Registry of Prohibition of Property Alienation.
  • Verification of legal disputes concerning the seller of the apartment under the contract.
  • Review of construction and technical documentation: urban planning conditions, building permits, construction expert reports, local and state government approvals.
  • Contractual authorization and proper property identification – correct location indication.
  • Analysis of other developments that have or haven’t been successfully completed and commissioned.

Explanation of risks and “pitfalls,” guarantees for fund returns in case of obligations violations.

Consultation on property inspections, advance payment, or deposit nuances,

Real estate agent agreement: terms analysis, consultation, and amendment suggestions.

Deposit agreement: review, consultation, risk explanation, and amendment proposals.

INVESTMENTS 
INVEST WISELY AND SAVE YOUR PEACE OF MIND!

Don’t fall victim to fraud and deceptive investments.

Verification of proposed investment schemes: legality, taxation, legal disputes, validity of proposed income, payment terms, interest accrual, and refund procedures.

Online investigation of potential partners: presence of required licenses/permits, charter capital, founders, establishment dates, business activities, tax debts, legal disputes, and bankruptcy/liquidation status.

Verification of potential partners – individuals: powers, real estate ownership, legal or enforcement proceedings, and debtor registry inclusion.

Contract analysis (investment, cooperation agreements) or other agreements for investment.

Explanation of risks, “pitfalls,” liabilities, guarantees for promised returns, and refund of investments in case of partner violations.

Proposal of new, most beneficial contract terms for the Client.

court-representation-consulting.title: Court Representation and Consulting
court-representation-consulting.content:
Court Representation and Consulting

  • Pre-trial and trial dispute resolution.
  • Lawyer services.
  • Consultations.
  • Strategy development to achieve desired results.
  • Analysis of judicial practice.
  • Document analysis, case evaluation, and cost forecasting.
  • Lawyer requests, evidence collection, obtaining necessary information, and document copies.
  • Representation of citizens and businesses in courts of all instances, state bodies, and organizations.
  • Preparation and submission of procedural documents (claims, appeals, cassations, motions).
  • Support for enforcement proceedings and debt recovery.
  • Appeal of unlawful actions or inactions of state bodies, local governments, or their officials.

english-speaking-lawyer.title: Lawyer Services - English-Speaking Lawyer
english-speaking-lawyer.content:
English-Speaking Lawyer

  • Contract and document analysis and translation.
  • Counterparty verification.
  • Negotiations with counterparties.
  • Drafting of any agreements and documents in English.

Why You Need an English-Speaking Lawyer...
